ygData.msgSnippet: Message: 5 Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 11:47:32 -0600 From: Howard Chan  Subject: Soul Reaver Today, I was talking to an old friend of mine.
ygData.messageBody:
Message: 5
Date: Wed, 7 Jul 1999 11:47:32 -0600
From: "Howard Chan" <howard.chan@...>
Subject: Soul Reaver

Today, I was talking to an old friend of mine. He said that he saw someone
with a sword called a Soul Reaver. It is believed that the Soul Reaver has
the stats of 20/32. It is also claimed to look similar to the Fiery Avenger,
except that there is a mist surrounding the blade. Does anyone have any info
on it? All of a sudden, my Dark Reaver seems to be swinger slower today . .
. hehe

yes i have heard of this sword it is a quest weapon but i do not know where or how to start the quest
